title: Priyanka Chopra dazzles in neon orange pantsuit alongside her cousin and fellow actress
text:
They're Bollywood screen stars and close cousins.

And Priyanka Chopra and Parineeti Chopra proved that beauty runs in the family as they appeared at Mumbai's first-ever NBA India Games 2019 on Saturday in two sharp outfits.

Priyanka, 37, was glowing in a bright orange wide-leg pantsuit that she wore sans shirt underneath.

Close: Priyanka Chopra and Parineeti Chopra proved that beauty runs in the family as they appeared at Mumbai's first-ever NBA India Games 2019 on Saturday in two sharp outfits

She finished off her outfit with a pair of pointed-toe heels in a tan color and finished off her face with a swipe of rust-colored lipstick.

Parineeti, 30, exposed a sliver of midriff in a pair of tailored trousers and a collared white crop top.

On the bottom she wore black heels adorned with spikes on a transparent strap.

Bright: Priyanka, 37, was glowing in a bright orange wide-leg pantsuit that she wore sans shirt underneath

Priyanka grinned from ear-to-ear as she sat on the sidelines of the court to watch the Sacramento Kings and Indiana Pacers make history as the first NBA teams to play in the country.

The games were played on Oct. 4 and Oct. 5 at the Dome, SVP, NSCI Stadium.

Her sighting comes as she is in the middle of a press blitz for her upcoming film The Sky Is Pink.

Fangirl: Priyanka grinned from ear-to-ear as she sat on the sidelines of the court to watch the Sacramento Kings and Indiana Pacers make history as the first NBA teams to play in the country

When speaking about the film, Priyanka told the Times of India that viewers should bring both their 'brain and heart' while watching.

'This is a very special film based on a special real-life couple who thrive through extraordinary circumstances,' she said.

'I feel like in a cynical world today where we live our own lives, this film shows you what it can do when you have a family, family support.'

Player: The games were played on Oct. 4 and Oct. 5 at the Dome, SVP, NSCI Stadium

She continued: 'I feel like when I read the movie [script], that's when you know.. jumped out at me so much because my parents were like that.

'They were extremely supportive and that gave me the ability to be who I am and where I am today. You will need your brain and your heart.'

The Sky Is Pink is set for release on October 11 in the USA.
